00064 #ifndef INCLUDE_DHCPC_H
00065 #define INCLUDE_DHCPC_H
00066 
00067 #include <inet/datatypes.h>
00068 
00069 #define DHCP_SERVER_PORT        67
00070 #define DHCP_CLIENT_PORT        68
00071 
00072 #define BOOT_REQUEST    1
00073 #define BOOT_REPLY              2
00074 
00075 /* DHCP client states */
00076 #define DHCP_STATE_INIT_REBOOT  0
00077 #define DHCP_STATE_REBOOTING    1
00078 #define DHCP_STATE_INIT                 2
00079 #define DHCP_STATE_SELECTING    3
00080 #define DHCP_STATE_REQUESTING   4
00081 #define DHCP_STATE_BOUND                5
00082 #define DHCP_STATE_RENEWING             6
00083 #define DHCP_STATE_REBINDING    7
00084 
00085 /* DHCP messages */
00086 #define DHCP_DISCOVER   1
00087 #define DHCP_OFFER              2
00088 #define DHCP_REQUEST    3
00089 #define DHCP_DECLINE    4
00090 #define DHCP_ACK                5
00091 #define DHCP_NAK                6
00092 #define DHCP_RELEASE    7
00093 #define DHCP_INFORM             8
00094 
00095 /* DHCP options */
00096 #define DHCP_OPT_PAD                    0
00097 #define DHCP_OPT_END                    255
00098 #define DHCP_OPT_SUBNET_MASK    1
00099 #define DHCP_OPT_TIME_OFFSET    2
00100 #define DHCP_OPT_ROUTER                 3
00101 #define DHCP_OPT_TIME_SERVER    4
00102 #define DHCP_OPT_NAME_SERVER    5
00103 #define DHCP_OPT_DNS_SERVER             6
00104 #define DHCP_OPT_HOST_NAME              12
00105 #define DHCP_OPT_POP3_SERVER    70
00106 #define DHCP_OPT_REQUESTED_IP   50
00107 #define DHCP_OPT_LEASE_TIME             51
00108 #define DHCP_OPT_OVERLOAD               52
00109 #define DHCP_OPT_MSG_TYPE               53
00110 #define DHCP_OPT_SERV_IDENT             54
00111 #define DHCP_OPT_PARAM_REQUEST  55
00112 #define DHCP_OPT_T1_VALUE               58
00113 #define DHCP_OPT_T2_VALUE               59
00114 
00115 INT8 dhcpc_init(void);
00116 void dhcpc_run(void);
00117 
00118 #endif
